title: Lost LP from winning ranked game

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Hi,
 
I played a ranked game today and at around the 10 - 15 minute mark my power went out.
My power comes back a few minutes later, but I noticed I lost LP.

The game was a stomp, so my team ended it at around the 20ish minute mark.
I linked the match.

Why did I lose LP?

replies.body: You lost power so i assume you disconnected from the game? Which counts as dcing which is afk. Afk players loose LP for abandoning games.
